name: Tale of Sands
description:
A journey to the nostalgia of the ancient Egyptian Kingdom, in a format of short novel.

From time to time, you will walk as the Pharaoh, the high priests, the royal guard, in order to discover the shadows and dark plots hidden beyond this kingdom...

Who will remain at your side at the last? Who shall betray you?

Three overlapping storylines narrating fates of 3 different characters can be found. And more.... if you are open to observations.
